name: Salon
description:
Prompt: "A game you can play using zoom remote control" 

Participants in zoom room can use ZOOM's annotate tool to draw the hair style you want.

Drag and move mouse to cut hair. 

To cut the hair on the left side, you need to drag and move your mouse from the bottom up.

To cut the hair on the right side, you need to drag and move your mouse from the top down.
